title: The Ravishing Idiot (1964) starring Anthony Perkins & Brigitte Bardot | Comedy Film

sources.title: The Ravishing Idiot (1964) starring Anthony Perkins & Brigitte Bardot | Comedy Film
sources.description:
A Russian spy is supposed by the British Secret Service to steal some faked orders, but he is too stupid to accomplish the mission. His girlfriend tries to help him, but it seems that even with her help, he is simply too foolish to succeed.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/ree4yPv-c8U


Original title: Une ravissante idiote (1964) AKA: Agent 38-24-36 / The Adorable Fool

This film is available with French & Russian audio, and subtitles in many more language options

Director: Édouard Molinaro
Writers: François Billetdoux, Charles Exbrayat, Édouard Molinaro
Stars: Brigitte Bardot, Anthony Perkins, Grégoire Aslan
Genre: Comedy, French Cinema


@CultCinemaClassics 

Members-only videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
